query:
-- Update RxGuard pricing to $39
UPDATE platforms 
SET price_monthly = 39.00 
WHERE platform_key = 'rxguard';

-- Add EndoGuard platform
INSERT INTO platforms (platform_key, platform_name, description, price_monthly, trial_days, trial_usage_limit) 
VALUES ('endoguard', 'EndoGuard™', 'Clinical-grade hormone intelligence platform', 97.00, 30, 10)
ON CONFLICT (platform_key) DO UPDATE 
SET price_monthly = 97.00, trial_days = 30, trial_usage_limit = 10;

-- Show all platforms
SELECT platform_key, platform_name, price_monthly, trial_days FROM platforms ORDER BY platform_key;
